scripts.test:all: yarn test:esm && yarn test:cjs && yarn test:mts && yarn test:deno
scripts.test:esm: yarn gen edgeql-js --target esm --output-dir test/esm/edgeql-js && cd test/esm && node test.js
scripts.test:cjs: yarn gen edgeql-js --target cjs --output-dir test/cjs/edgeql-js && cd test/cjs && node test.js
scripts.test:mts: yarn gen edgeql-js --target mts --output-dir test/mts/edgeql-js && cd test/mts && yarn build && node dist/test.js
scripts.test:deno: cd test/deno && deno task generate && deno task play
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && chmod +x dist/cli.js
